text: @realDonaldTrump 40 million lost jobs, 105,000 Covid19 deaths, nationwide protests, 90% small business failures, failed China Trade Deal, etc.. cannot be undone by your feelings of fast recovery. Everyone will not agree with your unrealistic expectations. Fairy tales won’t work for re-election.
